text: I am new here and hoping to find a solution to the issue I am experiencing at the moment

I am calling the endpoint that Retrieves threads but then want it to be sorted in descending order which I am not getting. However, I came across "Results are always returned in ascending order."  here "<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/conversations>".

Is there a way to make this response sorted in descending order? We have records as far back as 2020 and now that we are integrating into HubSpot, we want the items to be displayed from the most recent records

Whenever I query the crm associations batch api via the node client.crm.associations.batchApi.read('deal', 'company', batchInput) where batchInput is {id: <idhere>}, I only get the primary associated company. How can I get after all associated companies?

they are stored in a property called ‘hs_additional_emails’,
hope this helps

Greetings,

Starting on a new process:
1) Sales creates deal in HubSpot
2) Sales grab deal id and go to page that enter HS deal id and external quote id
3) System will grab data from external system and create a HubSpot quote with line items

Is there a best way via api to create a quote with line items?

Trying to add a note and associate it with an existing contact, but cannot seem to get it right. I went back to the documentation to try the Python sample code, but that is not working either. See: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/notes>

```import HubSpot
from HubSpot.crm.objects.notes import SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate, ApiException```
Returns:
```ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'HubSpot.crm.objects.notes'```
I've tried a pip upgrade of my HubSpot library, any other help is appreciated.

Hey I'm trying to query the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/web-analytics|Web-Analytics API> to get Unique Sessions, New Sessions etc.

But only this endpoint is offered:
GET*`/events/v3/events`*

Perhaps it's possible to get what I need from the endpoint, but I really don't know how...

Hi, I am trying to create reports in HubSpot based on Matomo analytics data. I have access to Matomo API and I can pull necessary data from there. However I don't know where should I store that data in HubSpot to be able to create analytics report and dashboards. One example of data is  Page visits and bounce rate per day or per week where the number of pages is about 500.
Would be also useful to understand where is the HubSpot analytics data stored actually?

Hello Everyone !! :wave:
I am trying to integrate HubSpot api with Angular 13.
so first , I started with OAuth2 to get the access and refresh token.
I am hitting this api :
<https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>
with this response body:
```const formData = {
  grant_type: 'authorization_code',
  client_id: CLIENT_ID,
  client_secret: CLIENT_SECRET,
  redirect_uri: REDIRECT_URI,
  code: req.query.code
};```
But I am hitting CORS error in this API. It works fine with Postman though.
Anybody has any idea on how to solve this ? Much help needed.
Private apps use Bearer authorization. So, the correct way to send the headers is Authorization: Bearer {private key}

Hello everyone!
I am using the settings/v3/users API to create users into HubSpot, is there a way for me to pass other attributes like firstname and lastname to HubSpot using this API?
